comments:
In the debug view I'm trying to set Instance Breakpoints.  This works fine if I
choose one of the items in the variables tab, but if I open up one of those
variables (with the + icon) and try "Instance Breakpoints..." on a field I get
the following exception in the log:

Adam, can you give some details on the code, type of variable you selected etc.
Some example code that you are debugging would be great.
I am having trouble reproducing your problem.
Can you also indicate the Eclipse build number you are using? Thanks.

The member variable was an array type.  I was accidently trying to set instance
breakpoints on the array itself instead of an element of the array.  The build
is 200403261517 (M8).

Fixed in InstanceFiltersAction.
Also took this opportunity to add a mnemonic for the Restrict breakpoints dialog

I modified JavaVariableActionFilter so the action doesn't appear for arrays. I
reworked #testAttribute() a bit.
